use.flag: Enable use of media-plugins/calf for adding various FX
Enable use of media-plugins/mda-lv2 for the loudness FX
Enable usse of media-libs/rubberband for the pitch shifting FX
Enable usse of media-plugins/gst-plugins-webrtc for the WebRTC support
Enable usse of media-libs/rnnoise for the noise canceling

pkgmetadata.longdescription: GUI to manage audio effects for Pulseaudio applications, giving full control over the effects order to the user.
